questions.content: Ms. Brooker _______offered to donate thirty of the office computers to a local elementary school.
Employees should remember to log out of ______work e-mail accounts when leaving for the day.
Mr. Biden asked his supervisor ______ deadline for this month's expense reports.
_______this afternoon's business seminar ends, Mr. Kane will have his staff clean the conference hall.
In an_____to boost annual revenue, Starlight Boutique will extend its weekend business hours.
To apply for the Web designer position, send us an e-mail______ the appropriate job vacancy code in the subject line.
A recent article on consumer trends claims that ______is increasing in all areas of theelectronics industry.
All Bousquet Garments products, including accessories,______ by us using priority post.
One of the requirements for the position is a willingness to go on ______ business tripsoverseas.
The MCA Art Convention gives artists a unique chance to ______ and discuss potential collaborations.
Please make sure that you submit all of the requested documents to our personnel department ______ May 31.
The board of directors announced that it will  ______find a replacement for the outgoing CEO.
Mr. Johnson is ______ to apply for the managerial position at Mind Tek, Inc., as he lacks experience in the field of robotics.
Rondel Plumbing Company offers a ______ range of apprenticeship opportunities for enthusiastic individuals.
The director of tonight's play asks that theatergoers ______ refrain from taking pictures during the performance.
Customers of Dillon's Furniture can view an ______ delivery date on the checkout page when placing an order online.
Krush Juice & Smoothies is downsizing its operations and will be ______ current menu choices. several of its current menu choices.
Under the ______ of Professor James Morton, Biosys Scotland's research team strives to develop cutting-edge health treatments.
Part-time telephone operators will be hired to help deal with the ______ number of customer calls during the company's busiest retail season.
Aquatastic Water Park will be offering discounts on children's day passes ______ the month of June.
The marketing director believes that the Burton Hotel and Willoughby Restaurant are ______ suitable venues for the year-end banquet.
The registration form needs to be filled out ______ black or blue ink and signed at the bottom.
Staff in the customer service department have reported that computer software errors are occurring with increasing ______
Residents of Ferndale have ______ concern that the construction of the proposed shopping mall will cause an increase in noise pollution.
As the head of the personnel department, Mr. Murphy is ______ for ensuring the happiness and welfare of all company employees.
The ______ estimate for the landscaping work at 525 Eglington Road was much lower than the actual final cost for the project.
Employees at Tripoint Engineering are rewarded each year for perfect ______and timekeeping.
Full details about the______  of the production manager position can be found on therecruitment page on our Web site.
Before making any changes to company policies, Ms. Kramer______  seeks the approval of the company president.
______  manufacturing costs have not significantly decreased, Matrox Chemicals has noted a sharp fall in its monthly expenditures.
